metadata.title: CVE-2024-50028 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal: core: Reference count the zone in thermal_zone_get_by_id()There are places in the thermal netlink code where nothing preventsthe thermal zone object from going away while being accessed after ithas been returned by thermal_zone_get_by_id().To address this, make thermal_zone_get_by_id() get a reference on thethermal zone device object to be returned with the help of get_device(),under thermal_list_lock, and adjust all of its callers to this changewith the help of the cleanup.h infrastructure.
